about_the_game:
The full soundtrack to Super Arcade Racing! Bring back the 80s to full life with this inspired-to-the-classics soundtrack. Listen it at work, while driving or whenever. A nostalgic jump to the past is guaranteed! The Super Arcade Racing soundtrack will be downloaded to your computer as MP3 files. You must have Super Arcade Racing installed on your computer as well to receive the DLC content. Composed and played back with our in-house, custom made music tracker engine!

Composed by Simon Haines (Twitter: @Quistard)
